item.title: German auto woes deepen: Audi to cut 7,500 jobs by 2029 amid rising Chinese competition and EV slowdown
item.description: Audi will cut 7,500 jobs in Germany by 2029, blaming weak EV demand and Chinese competition, while investing €8 billion in its home factories.
